messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] We have a new family member
messages.msgSnippet: KathrynJB@aol.com ... We just came into a new kitty also. He is a gray furry tiger with blue eyes. He was named tiger after our old one.  He loves the fridge
messages.messageBody:
KathrynJB@...
writes:

> We have a new baby. Her name is Bast, and she's 12 weeks old, black and
> white, and very, very cute.
>
We just came into a new kitty also. He is a gray furry tiger with blue eyes.
He was named tiger after our old one. He loves the fridge and has been
trapped in there once for a minute or so. The people that had him where feeding him
milk so he knows where to get the grub. He is very sweet.

He drives the youngest Brittany nuts, Tucker wants that kitty so bad. He has
gotten to him once but just jumped around and batted him but he is much
heavier than the kitten. Though Nicholas 15mo pucks him up side down, by a foot you
name it. Tiger comes back for more though. Usually Nick carries the kitten to
me. He loves the kitten, we all do.

Laura
3 dogs, 3 cats , 3 kids, 1 bunny and a baby one the way. And I wonder where
there is so much fur on my couch


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] We have a new family member
messages.msgSnippet: Something must be going around. Our new kitty is now 12 weeks. Cody. He s all white with black spots on him. The kids call him a dalmation cat. My former step
messages.messageBody:
Something must be going around. Our new kitty is now 12 weeks. Cody. He's
all white with black spots on him. The kids call him a dalmation cat. My
former step daughter calls him moo cat!! He's just too cute and very silly
which gives the kids hours of watching entertainment!!!

Mary B.
http://www.homeschoolingtshirts.com

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] We have a new family member

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/5/03 1:29:17 PM Eastern Daylight Time, KathrynJB@...
writes:

> We have a new baby. Her name is Bast, and she's 12 weeks old, black and
> white, and very, very cute.
>

She sounds like our new kitty.. Well, she's not "new" anymore.. she is also
about 12 weeks old, we got her when she was 6 weeks old. She is black and white
too and her name is Claudia.. We got her mother also. She is solid black,
long silky hair..very sleek with green eyes.. Her name is Akasha. They must be
vampire cats..:-)

Teresa

> We have a new baby. Her name is Bast, and she's 12 weeks old, black and

messages.subject: We have a new family member
messages.msgSnippet: We have a new baby. Her name is Bast, and she s 12 weeks old, black and white, and very, very cute. Actually, she s Julian s 14th birthday present. We lost two
messages.messageBody:
We have a new baby. Her name is Bast, and she's 12 weeks old, black and
white, and very, very cute.

Actually, she's Julian's 14th birthday present. We lost two of our very old
cats in the last year or so, and were down to one. So this new baby is very
fun. She's very playful and has a very loud purr. And Julian is in love.

Kathryn



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
